comment.author: 55291047@N03
comment._content: great photography and a reference theme for landscape photography.My favourites

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.dunwurkin.info/interests/broadspostcards/images/thorp... is another picture of the same stretch of river, identified as the Yare at Thorpe St. Andrew, Norfolk, which is a suburb of Norwich.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: And another picture is at www.photosofchurches.com/norfolk-thorpe-church.htm commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Thorpe_St_Andrew_Church_-... and other recent photos indicate that the spire has been shortened since the picture used for the photochrom was taken. www.georgeplunkett.co.uk/Norfolk/tho.htm has pictures from 1954 and 1955 that show the removal of the spire.
